title: ID this font? Helvetica Neue, Futura, Bryant
content:
I’m looking for this font, it seems similar to Helvetica Neue, Futura, or Bryant... any idea what it is?  
Or maybe it’s a proprietary Ford font?

[Here’s the image](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122030945/http:/img354.imageshack.us/img354/2203/navfontkf3.jpg)

Thanks in advance!  
~Lauren

 [‹ Arial Narrow -- Availability](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122030945/http:/www.typophile.com/node/48151 "Go to previous forum topic") [What Font Is Used On This Argentina Jersey? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122030945/http:/www.typophile.com/node/48145 "Go to next forum topic")
author: harmanl

comments.content:
By Jove, I think you’ve got it!  
Many thanks, Font Genius!
